title: MDF Connect Internal Status Entry
description: Schema for a submission status entry in MDF Connect.

active.description: True when the submission is in progress, False otherwise.

cancelled.description: True when submission has been cancelled or is pending cancellation, False otherwise.

citrine_id.description: The ID of the dataset in Citrination.

code.description: The submission's status code. Each character represents a step in the process.

messages.description: Detailed status message to be paired with a code character.

oneOf.description: A multi-part message (ex. A message and a link).

pid.description: The ID of the submission-processing process.

submitter.description: The name of the submission submitter (and therefore owner).

user_email.description: The contact email for the submission owner.

user_id.description: The Globus UUID of the submission owner.

original_submission.description: The original Connect submission, as a JSON string.

updates.description: Any submitted updates ot the original submission.

extensions.description: The file extensions found in the data (for re-processing purposes).

hibernating.description: True for submission processes that appear dead, but are still active. This flag will prevent a submission from being cancelled when its process dies.
